text.autoconfig.zombifiedplayer.title: Zombified Player
text.autoconfig.zombifiedplayer.option.s: Spawn a zombified player after death
If enabled, a zombified player will spawn after death | default: enabled
text.autoconfig.zombifiedplayer.option.t: Transfer the players Main and Off Hand to the zombified player
If enabled, the Main and the Off Hand of the dead player will be transferred to the zombified player | default: enabled
Transfer the players Armor to the zombified player
If enabled, the Armor of the dead player will be transferred to the zombified player | default: enabled
Transfer the players Inventory to the zombified player
If enabled, the Inventory of the dead player will be transferred to the zombified player | default: enabled
text.autoconfig.zombifiedplayer.option.o: Spawn zombified player only if player was killed by other Zombies
If enabled, zombified player will only spawn if the player was killed by an undead mob | default: enabled
text.autoconfig.zombifiedplayer.option.z: If enabled, zombified players can break through doors | default: enabled
text.autoconfig.zombifiedplayer.option.m: If enabled, zombified players are stronger faster and have more health | default: disabled
text.autoconfig.zombifiedplayer.option.l: If unsuccessful, stop trying to fetch the player skin
If enabled, the mod will stop trying to fetch the player skin after several unsuccessful tries | default: enabled
